name: Scroll&Roll!
description:
IMPORTANT: The game can only be played on www.scrollnroll.ml! Multiplayer

You have the opportunity to play with random enemys, or create an private Game and invite up to 5 Friends!

Singleplayer

If you don't want to wait for others you can also play alone. Just click on Search and select Solo.

Other Information

- This game is 100% Html, Css and Javascript!

- No Canvas used.

- Runs over Express & Socket.

I'm happy about every Feedback I get! Enjoy!
